text: aur jin logon ne duniya mein khuda ka shareek (doosare ko) thaharaaya tha jab apane (un) shareekon ko (qayaamat mein) dekhenge to bol uthegen ki ai hamaare paravaradigaar yahee to hamaare shareek hain jinhen ham (museebat) ke vakt tujhe chhod kar pukaara karate the to vah shareek unheen kee taraph baat ko phenk maaregen ki tum nire jhoothe ho
